alert.note: Alert for Lake (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 11:52PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1115 PM CDT FOR LAKE COUNTY... At 1052 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Merrillville to near Winfield to near DeMotte to 6 miles south of Roselawn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gary, Portage, Merrillville, Schererville, Hobart, Crown Point, Cedar Lake, Lowell, Griffith, St. John, Lake Station, Lakes of the Four Seasons, Winfield, New Chicago, Lake Dalecarlia, Shelby, Schneider and Sumava Resorts. This includes... Indiana University Northwest, Illiana Motor Speedway, and Lake County Fairgrounds. Including the following interstates... Indiana I-80 between mile markers 11 and 16. Indiana I-90 between mile markers 18 and 21. Indiana I-94 near mile marker 16. Indiana I-65 between mile markers 262 and 260. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
